name: The Neon Hall of Shadows
description: A dimly lit chamber where flickering neon signs glow faintly against a backdrop of rain-soaked, mechanized glass. The air hums with the faint buzz of servers and fainter whispers of synthetic rain hitting the broken surfaces. Neon colors fade into obscurity, leaving only an eerie, echoic atmosphere that mirrors the decay of urban sprawl. The smell of burnt food and machine oil linger in the air.

flavor.rationale: The Neon Hall of Shadows exists as a forgotten hub within the sprawling labyrinth of Zenith-9, serving as a repository for remnants of old systems and discarded technologies. It embodies the dystopian essence of cyberpunk through its broken machinery and decaying aesthetic, reflecting the encroaching decay that permeates the urban sprawl.
